title: Refraction Calculation
description: This function calculates the refraction value given an elevation input. The elevation value is constrained within specific limits and is used in a mathematical formula to derive the refraction result.
name: REFRACTION

input.name: ELEV
input.description: The elevation in degrees which will be used in the refraction calculation.

output.name: REFRACTION
output.description: The calculated refraction value based on the input elevation.

return_value.description: The output value representing the refraction calculated from the given elevation.
